publish.title: Are you sure you want to publish this PDA?
publish.text: Publishing this PDA will make it accessible by all users.

unpublish.title: Are you sure to unpublish this PDA?
unpublish.text: If you unpublish this PDA, users will not be able to see it anymore.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this PDA?
delete.text: If you delete this PDA, you will not be able to access it and this action cannot be undone.

error.toggle: An error occured, couldn't toggle PDA state.
error.delete: An error occured, couldn't delete PDA.
